attributes.action: charge people who don't use their vehicles ashtrays and flick ash and cigarette/cigar buts out of the window.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is disgusting, there are ashtrays in vehicles for a reason.  These people should be charged with littering and driving without due care and attention.

rejection.details: Thank you but this overlaps with an existing petition http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Smoke-driving/ If you still wish to lodge this petition, please re-submit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
